Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: teachers can only help you so much but AI can go further

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI feedback made me feel as though I could improve right now. whereas teaching gave me feedback that was after the assignment are handed in and I cannot do anything now to change it

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI can be comprehensive and give more feedback on the little things such as grammar, phrasing and punctuation
